# Homework 2 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Problem 1
```{r}
trash_wheel_df <- 
  read_excel("./data_hw_2/HealthyHarborWaterWheelTotals2018-7-28.xlsx", sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(-x15) %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(
    sports_balls = round(pull(trash_wheel_df, sports_balls), 0) %>% 
      as.integer(pull(trash_wheel_df, sports_balls))
  )
```
